thread.title: SEMYOU Cloud Services Secures $200M Through U.S. Investor
thread.title_full: SEMYOU Cloud Services Secures $200M Through U.S. Investor

title: SEMYOU Cloud Services Secures $200M Through U.S. Investor
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed SEMYOU Cloud Services Secures $200M Through U.S. Investor New round of funding will enable SEMYOU to expand their dev labs, enter new markets, and launch new data centers. YouTube Video Investor has invested over $200 million in SEMYOU Cloud Services. The fresh capital infusion will enable SEMYOU to extend their development and provide more enterprise apps. PALO ALTO, CA, September 28,   SEMYOU, a well-respected provider of Cloud-Service solutions, was pleased to announce that they have succeeded in securing a new round of funding. A U.S. Investor has invested over $200 million in SEMYOU Cloud Services. The fresh capital infusion will enable SEMYOU to extend their development and provide more enterprise apps. The new funding will help support their growth in the service sector, as well as all departments and the partner network. Their strategy is clear, to be the best cloud-service provider in the world. SEMYOU will now optimize their infra-structure and be prepared for new market entries, and the next generation of cloud products. The fresh capital gives them the opportunity to extend their portfolio and concentrate on the SEMYOU mobile suite, and add more enterprise apps. The current 30+ Enterprise Apps are already an industry first, providing ready-to-use Apps for varied phases of operating a business, and all scalable. During a recent interview, Volker Jahns, CEO of SEMYOU, said: "The market statistics forecast foresees a big investment of companies into cloud-computing. We will be ready with our services for any size project, and are continuously building up new development and research teams." SEMYOU has also recently entered into agreements with new partners that specialize in Cloud-Computing regarding Hardware, Infrastructure (IaaS) and Platform (PaaS). Let's face it, people all over the world are more concerned about Internet security than ever before. Data breaches don't just affect large companies, no firm is immune from attempted security breaches. The SEMYOU platform is a second generation cloud service that offers the ability for each cloud to be stored privately and securely.Founded in 2009 by Volker Jahns, semYOU LLC is now the leading global cloud company for business cloud applications. Its core app platform is SEMYOU, the first Cloud-Office Framework for any size of company. For more information, graphs, photos or interviews, please contact: http://www.semyou.com . Media Contact:
